Forensic Algorithms with Emily Paul 🥼

Mar 3, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • forensic algorithms
  • congress
  • policy
  • techcongress
  • politics

Emily Paul joins us for a conversation about their work as a TechCongress fellow in the area of forensic algorithms. We’ll cover that topic area as well as the work they did with Representative Mark Takano to put together the Justice in Forensic Algorithms Act of 2019.
